snippet: The photographer Arne Svenson created portraits of passerby along a busy, blank white construction wall in the city.
abstract: The photographer Arne Svenson created portraits of passerby along a busy, blank white construction wall in the city.
lead_paragraph: In this weekly series, T’s photo editors share the most compelling visual projects they’ve discovered.

headline.main: Surreal Depictions of the Denizens of Las Vegas
